form.official-title: To deny admission to the United States to any representative to the United Nations who has engaged in espionage activities against the United States, poses a threat to United States national security interests, or has engaged in a terrorist activity against the United States.

section.header: Visa limitation for certain representatives to the United Nations
section.text: Section 407(a) of the Foreign Relations Authorization Act, Fiscal Years 1990 and 1991 (8 U.S.C. 1102 note) is amended—

paragraph.text: by striking such individual has been found to have been engaged in espionage activities and inserting the following: “such individual—
has engaged in espionage activities or a terrorist activity (as defined in section 212(a)(3)(B)(iii) of the Immigration and Nationality Act (8 U.S.C. 1182(a)(3)(B)(iii)))
by striking allies and may pose and inserting the following: “allies; and
